descrption:


steps to reproduce:
1.go to chart dialog>Data>Y Axis
2.click on series grouping key Format button
3.in format spcifier dialog,choose advanced. and type some text into it.
4. click on OK button

actual result:
Exception thrown out

expected result:
Exception should be processed before written to error log or some error 
message should pop up to warn user
